name: Priyansh Mishra
bio: Hey there, I'm Priyansh Mishra, your friendly neighborhood tech enthusiast! I'm passionate about all things innovative and love diving into new technologies.

top_projects.name: GeoCountyMapper
top_projects.description: python script to get the county from latitude and longitude using OpenStreetMap's Nominatim API

top_projects.name: social-media-platform-assignment
top_projects.description: This was an assignment that was given to add new features, though it was my first time interatcing with c#, angular, dotnet but the experience was amazing.

top_projects.name: RPS-Royale
top_projects.description: An original responsive Rock Paper Scissors game where you face off against the computer. sound effects with the option to mute and unmute. Play anytime, anywhere on any device.

devb.io.summary: Recent activities on devb.io include multiple push events focused on implementing scroll synchronization between the left and right sections on the user profile page, enhancing user experience through smoother scrolling behavior.

django-quiz-app.summary: The django-quiz-app repository saw updates with push events adding static files and updating the base URL, indicating ongoing development and refinement of the quiz application's core functionalities.

Movie-verse-web-app.summary: Activity on the Movie-verse-web-app included pull requests aimed at fixing the search functionality, where data fetch issues were addressed, ensuring that search results are properly displayed and improving the overall application usability.

Tax_Sale.summary: The Tax_Sale repository experienced a pull request updating dependencies in the requirements.txt file, which is crucial for project setup and dependency management, reflecting efforts to maintain the project's integrity and ease of use.

profile_summary:
Priyansh Mishra is a highly skilled and innovative developer with a strong foundation in programming languages such as JavaScript, C++, and TypeScript. With a keen interest in emerging technologies, Priyansh is always looking to expand his skill set and stay up-to-date with the latest industry trends. As a dedicated and passionate technologist, he has built a reputation for delivering high-quality solutions and collaborating effectively with others to achieve common goals. With a growing network of like-minded professionals, Priyansh has established himself as a reliable and knowledgeable expert in his field, with 7 followers who appreciate his technical expertise and insights.

As an active and prolific developer, Priyansh has developed and maintained 41 public repositories, demonstrating his commitment to ongoing learning and improvement. His passion for innovation and problem-solving has enabled him to develop a unique value proposition, leveraging his technical skills to drive growth and success in his projects. With a strong online presence and a portfolio that showcases his expertise in JavaScript, C++, and TypeScript, Priyansh is well-positioned to make a significant impact in the tech industry, and his skills and experience make him an attractive collaborator or partner for businesses and individuals seeking high-quality technology solutions.
